1000.title: Water Well Project
1000.body:
In Bangladesh, which has a population of 180 million, approximately 60% of its population lives in villages. And the main occupation of these people is farmers. Due to the seasonal floods, storms, other natural disasters, & also other problems, people in Bangladesh are facing a shortage of drinking water.

Firstly, we identify the places that are facing drinking water problems with the help of our fieldworkers. Afterward, we check the depth of groundwater level, so that we can set up a deep tubewell based on its deepness.

Interested organizations can contact us for a cooperation agreement.

1001.title: Wudhu Khana Project
1001.body:
In Bangladesh, which has a population of 180 million, approximately 60% of its population lives in villages. And the main occupation of these people is farmers. Due to the seasonal floods, storms, other natural disasters, & also other problems, people in Bangladesh are facing a shortage of drinking water. In addition, there are not sufficient ablution places in mosques in the village.

Firstly, we identify the places that are facing drinking water problems with the help of our fieldworkers. Afterward, we check the depth of groundwater level, so that we can set up a deep tubewell based on its deepness.


Interested organizations can contact us for a cooperation agreement.

1002.title: Quran Distribution Project
1002.body:
The first verse revealed to our Prophet (PBUH) is 'Read, ˹O Prophet,˺ in the Name of your Lord Who created!' For obeying this order and delivering Holy Quran to people, a project called -Quran Gift Distribution- is carried out by Ottoman International Organization & Construction.

Under this project, Qur'an with Bengali meaning is being provided as a gift to both students and general people. In madrasahs or Islamic schools, the Qur'an & Rehals are also distributed.


Interested organizations can contact us for a cooperation agreement.

1003.title: Orphan Support
1003.body:
According to a statistic made in 2021, the number of orphaned children is 153 million around the world. But the actual number is more than that. We should know that if an orphan smiles, the world smiles.

Allah says in the Qur'an:
وَيُطْعِمُونَ الطَّامَ عَلَى حُبِّهِ مِسْكِيْنًا وَيَتِيْمًا وَأَسِيْرًا،

They feed their food to the poor, orphans, and captives.

Our Prophet (PBUH) says, If a person takes an orphan among Muslims and takes him to his home to feed and drink, Allah will put him in Paradise unless he commits an unforgivable crime -Tirmidhi, Birr 14.

Considering the following verses, hadith, and social responsibilities, Ottoman International Organization & Construction provides orphan clothing, monthly scholarship support for orphans carries out projects.


Interested organizations can contact us for a cooperation agreement.

1004.title: Social Liabilities Project
1004.body:
Humans are social creatures. Human society is directly or indirectly dependent on each other. For this reason, it is must duty to raise our hands towards needy people.

As Ottoman International Organization & Construction, it carries out a project called the Social Responsibility Project to meet the needs of people in need of help in the society.

Under this project, We supply ready food, dry food, iftar supports, tree plantation, etc. In addition, we also support the people who face natural disasters such as storms & floods.
Interested organizations can contact us for a cooperation agreement.

1005.title: Social Construction Project
1005.body:
The accommodation problem is one of the terrible problems for the people living in underdeveloped countries whose financial situation is not well. According to a statistic made in 2020, the number of homeless people in the world is around 100 million. But the actual number is more than that.

By considering this important issue, Ottoman International Organization & Construction brings a new project called the Social Construction Project.

Under this project, there are some pre-planned projects such as accommodation support for homeless families, orphanages for orphans, schools, dormitories for students, madrasah, mosque construction for village people.

Interested organizations can contact us for a cooperation agreement.

1006.title: Qurban Organization
1006.body:
Ottoman International Organization Construction carries out various social activities with a large working team to bring aid to the places where it is needed. Our Sacrifice Organization is one of them. We organize all types of Qurban projects you will make such as Akika, Nawafil, Wajib & others.

How Does Our Qurbani Organization Work?
We carefully select Qurbani animals. With your support, we will receive your power of attorney and create your registration. The slaughtered Qurbans are divided into shares according to the conditions and given to the poor and needy orphans. We share the videos of the Qurbani with our valuable customers. Within these steps, we can successfully complete our project.

Interested organizations can contact us for a cooperation agreement.

aboutpage.whoarewe: Ottoman International Organization Construction Ltd. was founded in 2021 by SHIHAB AHMED with the aim and passion to change the world and make it a better, fairer, and more sustainable place.
aboutpage.ourmission: Conscious of our material and moral values, our volunteers, who are concerned about the problems of humanity, especially the Anatolian people and especially the Islamic Ummah, and who seek solutions for the problems of humanity, gather the aid of our volunteers under a corporate roof, and knowing the problems of Muslims wherever they are, we ensure the unity and love of humanity among Muslims. is to serve

ourvalues.sustainability: While we create the present in all our works, we act with the awareness that the responsibility of the future is on us. Considers the fine but important line between our needs and wants
ourvalues.respect: Respect is the basis of all our projects, especially our trainings. With our projects, we want to create a change and add something to the lives of the people who participate in these programs, while we respect people's current cultures and preferences.
ourvalues.transparency: Since the understanding of respect is embedded in all of our projects, we handle all our affairs with great transparency. You can follow every moment of the help you give. Therefore, trust is endless
